official_title: Recognizing the 10th anniversary of the dedication of the Vietnam Women's Memorial.

summary.text: Recognizes: (1) the important contributions of women who served in the U.S. armed forces during the Vietnam War; and (2) the 10th anniversary of the dedication of the Vietnam Women's Memorial.

titles.title: Recognizing the 10th anniversary of the dedication of the Vietnam Women's Memorial.
